src:
Plamen u kojem je buknuo Boriša Simanić
Mladi košarkaš Crvene zvezde pokazao da ume da se nosi sa pritiskom i odigra dobro kada je to najvažnije

01 Nov 2019

Čekali su navijači Crvene zvezde od samog starta sezone na Borišu Simanića u sastavu, pitali se šta se dešava sa talentovanim mladim košarkašem i zbog čega ne dobija nešto veću minutažu. Može se reći da su ga sinoć dočekali. Andrija Gavrilović je prepoznao momenat, gurnuo je Simanića u vatru i to se Zvezdi višestruko isplatilo.
Sjajni Simanić bio je najbolji pojedinac u raspucanom Zvezdinom kolektivu. Odmah na početku je pokazao da nije previše impresioniran sjajnim rivalom i krenuo je da “sipa” trojku za trojkom. Upravo predvođeni njim, crveno-beli su uspeli da dođu do ključne rezultatske prednosti.
Kada se podvuče crta, Simanić je meč završio sa čak 18 postignutih poena, uz četiri trojke. Ali nije se njegova igra svela samo na napad, pošto je odličan doprinos dao i u defanzivi, gde je omogućio čvrstinu i stabilnost, koja je naterala goste na veliki broj izgubljenih lopti.
Jasno je da je Simanić na najbolji mogući način iskoristio činjenicu da su Mohamed Faje i Derik Braun morali da ostanu van protokola zbog povreda, pa je sada nametnuo pitanje da li zaslužuje da polako, ali sigurno preuzme njihovo “startno” mesto u sastavu.
Sa igrom kakvu je pokazao sinoć to definitivno zaslužuje. Međutim, pošto je suštinski reč o još uvek jako mladom igraču, za očekivati je da tokom sezone bude većih oscilacija, uspona i padova, što je uostalom juče na konferenciji za medije podvukao i sam Andrija Gavrilović."Boriša sa svojim vrlinama i manama je podložan oscilacijama, jer je mlad, ali je isto tako talentovan. Počinjao je u postavi kada nije imao takav učinak. Ja jako želim da on napreduje u karijeri, za šta mu treba kontinuitet, malo više drskosti koju je večeras pokazao. Pa čak i kada lopta ne uđe, on može da bude koristan za ekipu. Kako na domaćem, tako i na gostujućim terenima", rekao je tada prvi trener Crvene zvezde.



Uostalom, dosta dugo Simanić nije uspevao da se izbori za adekvatnu šansu, naročito dok je na klupi sedeo Milan Tomić. Ipak, njegov zamenik Andrija Gavrilović prepoznao je talenat i želju kod mladog Simanića, pa se može reći da je Zvezda u sred nove takmičarske sezone dobila nebrušeni dragulj, koji kako utakmice budu odmicale ima da bude sve sjajniji. To je u momentu kada stranci sve više zauzimaju ključne pozicije u timu važno i sa aspekta srpske košarke. Odavno se nije desilo da srpska košarka “lansira” nekog novog, talentovanog košarkaša.
Svedoci smo da ovoga leta nije baš najbolje išlo ni na polju mlađih reprezentativnih selekcija, pa se zbog toga sasvim opravdano postavlja pitanje da li je upravo Borišin put u Crvenoj zvezdi način da se mladi i talentovani košarkaši afirmišu i steknu neophodno iskustvo. Čak se može reći i da su “domaći” najviše izneli teret na početku sezone, dok su “stranci” polako pronalazili korak.
Sam Simanić pokazao je sinoć nakon utakmice da je zadovoljan pobedom i pruženom partijom, ali da je ostao čvrsto na zemlji i da je spreman da pokaže da sve neće ostati samo na jednoj utakmici i dobroj partiji."Podiglo mi se samopouzdanje. Video sam da mogu da nastavim da ubacujem na taj način. Nismo sezonu počeli na najbolji način, ali trgnuli smo se, pobedili smo večeras i sada željno iščekujemo nastavak. Moguće da će to biti dodatni zamajac za nastavak", rekao je talentovani košarkaš.
Bilo kako bilo, ovaj udar adrenalina možda je i bilo ono što je neophodno Crvenoj zvezdi nakon dužeg perioda. Ostaje da vidimo da li će u istom ritmu nastaviti na krilima Boriše Simanića ili nekog drugog.
Piše: Srđan TODOROVIĆ
text:
The flame in which Borisa Simanic erupted
The young Red Star basketball player has shown that he can handle the pressure and play well when it matters most

01 Nov 2019

Red Star fans have been waiting since the start of the season on Boris Simanic as part of the squad, wondering what is happening to the talented young basketball player and why he is not getting a little bigger minutes. It could be said that they welcomed him last night. Andrija Gavrilovic recognized the moment, pushed Simanic into the fire, and that paid the Star multiple times.
The brilliant Simanic was the best individual in the bursting Star Collective. Immediately at the beginning he showed that he was not too impressed with his great rival and started to pour three after three. Just led by him, the red and whites managed to reach a key result advantage.
When the line was drawn, Simanić finished the match with as many as 18 points, with four triples. But his play was not limited to attack, as he made an excellent contribution to the defense, where he provided solidity and stability, which forced the guests to a large number of lost balls.
It is clear that Simanic made the most of the fact that Mohamed Faye and Derrick Brown had to stay out of protocol due to injuries, so now he has raised the question of whether he deserves to slowly but surely take their "starting" place in the squad.
With the game he showed last night, he definitely deserves it. However, since it is essentially a very young player, it is expected that during the season there will be greater oscillations, ups and downs, which was emphasized by Andriy Gavrilovic himself at the press conference yesterday. "Borisa is subject to his virtues and disadvantages." oscillations because he's young but he's just as talented. He started in the lineup when he didn't have that effect. I very much want him to progress in his career, for which he needs continuity, a little more audacity he showed tonight. Even when the ball he doesn't come in, he can be useful for the team. Both on the home and away ground, "said the first Red Star coach at the time.



After all, for a long time Simanic did not manage to fight for an adequate chance, especially while Milan Tomic was sitting on the bench. However, his deputy Andrija Gavrilovic recognized the talent and desire of young Simanic, so it can be said that in the middle of the new competitive season, Zvezda received an unbroken gem, which as the games progressed will be getting brighter. This is at a time when foreigners are increasingly occupying key positions in the team, also from the aspect of Serbian basketball. It has long since happened that Serbian basketball is “launching” some new, talented basketball player.
We are witnessing that this summer did not perform very well in the field of junior representative selections, and therefore it is quite reasonable to question whether Borisa's path in the Red Star is a way for young and talented basketball players to affirm and gain the necessary experience. It can even be said that the "locals" made the most of the burden at the beginning of the season, while the "foreigners" were slowly finding the pace.
Simanic himself showed last night after the game that he was satisfied with the victory and the party provided, but that he remained firm on the ground and was ready to show that everything would not remain in one game and a good party. "My confidence was raised. I saw that I could "We didn't start the season the best way, but we started, we won tonight and now we are eagerly awaiting the sequel. It may be an additional momentum to continue," said the talented basketball player.
Be that as it may, this adrenaline rush may have been what was needed for the Red Star after a long period. It remains to be seen whether they will continue in the same rhythm on the wings of Borisa Simanic or someone else.
By: Srdjan TODOROVIC
